massives.problem: The first value of an array called quizzes can be accessed with which of the following statements?
Which of the following statements outputs the fifth value in the quizzes array?
Which of the following is NOT the Selection Control Structure?
What is the length of the following array: byte[] data = { 12, 34, 9, 0, -62, 88 }
Which of the following is FALSE about arrays on Java
massives.answer1: A java array is always an object
massives.answer2: Arrays in Java are always allocated on heap
massives.answer3: Length of array can be changed after creation of array
massives.answer4: Arrays in Java can contain different types of variables
massives.correct: Length of array can be changed after creation of array

massives.problem:
int [] nums = {2, 3, 5, 8, 9, 11};
How would you access the fourth element in nums?

What are the legal indexes for the array ar, given the following declaration:
int[] ar = {2, 4, 6, 8 }
